Manufactured from premium grade high-spe: Manufactured from premium grade high-speed steel with optimized alloy composition. The material undergoes vacuum heat treatment to achieve HRC 60-65 hardness, providing exceptional wear resistance and edge retention. This ensures consistent cutting performance over extended production runs with minimal degradation.
Each blade is precision ground using adv: Each blade is precision ground using advanced CNC grinding technology to ensure perfect concentricity and edge geometry. The cutting edge is ground to micron-level tolerances (±0.01mm), resulting in clean, burr-free cuts. Surface finish is polished to Ra 0.4μm for reduced friction and enhanced cutting efficiency.
The cutting edge features an optimized a: The cutting edge features an optimized angle and relief design specifically engineered for your application. Available in various edge profiles including straight, beveled, and specialized geometries. This design minimizes cutting force while maximizing edge life and cut quality across different materials.
Every blade undergoes comprehensive qual: Every blade undergoes comprehensive quality inspection including dimensional verification, hardness testing, surface finish measurement, and dynamic balance checking. Common questions about our rolling shear: Common questions about our rolling shear slitting blades
Blade life depends on material being cut: Blade life depends on material being cut, cutting speed, and maintenance practices. Our HSS blades typically last 5-10 times longer than standard blades. In metal slitting applications, expect hundreds of thousands of linear meters before re-sharpening is needed. Proper lubrication and regular inspection extend blade life significantly.
Yes, our rolling shear blades are design: Yes, our rolling shear blades are designed for multiple re-sharpening cycles. Professional re-grinding can restore cutting performance to near-original condition. Most blades can be re-sharpened 3-5 times or more, depending on wear patterns and application. We offer re-sharpening services with quick turnaround times.
Our rolling shear blades handle a wide r: Our rolling shear blades handle a wide range of materials including steel, stainless steel, aluminum, copper, brass, plastic films, paper, cardboard, rubber, foam, textiles, and composite materials. Material thickness and hardness determine optimal blade specification. Contact us for application-specific recommendations.
Blade selection depends on your machine: Blade selection depends on your machine specifications, material type, and cutting requirements. Key factors include outer diameter (matching machine arbor spacing), bore size (matching arbor diameter), and blade thickness (based on slitting precision needs). Our technical team can help specify the optimal configuration for your application.
Standard size blades typically ship with: Standard size blades typically ship within 7-10 business days. Custom configurations require 2-4 weeks depending on specifications and quantity. Large volume orders may require additional production time. We maintain inventory of popular sizes for immediate shipment. Rush orders can be accommodated in many cases.
Yes, comprehensive technical support is: Yes, comprehensive technical support is included with all blade orders. We provide installation guidelines, setup recommendations, troubleshooting assistance, and optimization advice. Our technical team can help with blade selection, machine setup, and performance optimization. Training materials and best practices documentation are available.
Get detailed specifications, material gr: Get detailed specifications, material grades, dimensional charts, and application guidelines for our complete range of rolling shear slitting blades. Download our comprehensive product catalog in PDF format.
